title: California's Never-Ending Fire Season
description:
California is battling its most destructive wildfires in state history. The death toll and the scope of the devastation are only expected to climb. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's weather reporter Brian K. Sullivan on what's behind the everlasting fire season in California and the role climate change is playing in it.  
FOLLOW UP
 Brian's latest report: California Fires Death Toll Rises to 31 With More Winds Predicted
You can follow Brian at: @WeatherSullivan 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
